name: Sidebar Navigation Starter Kit
description:
I used standard practices in creating this Sidebar Navigation. Some of the practices include:


  • Use of Auto Layout
  • Use of Components and Variants
  • Proper Naming Convention
  • Use of Style Guide


It also contains a dark and light mode. This sidebar can suit in any of your web dashboard project. Feel free to use this as a starter kit as the file is free.


I will also be rolling out updates. So check from time to time.


Created with Love ❤️
